revised_title: Matrix Analysis of Particle Assembly Processes in Grinding Mills
tldr: The authors present a matrix analysis method to study processes involving particle assemblies in grinding mills, focusing on coal breakage. They introduce a breakage and selection function to describe the size distribution of products from particle-breaking processes, such as ball mills, rod mills, and jaw crushers. The matrix treatment provides a practical analysis method that can be applied to various processes and helps predict the size distribution of products.
